Created attachment 9247276
screenshot of messaging system dropdown truncations

Attached is an example.  Thanks to Mardak for bisecting; the regression happened in one of [these commits](https://hg.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/pushloghtml?fromchange=8e27fe76645b992566c8fe35bed8d6a37b0ecdb8&tochange=f02664c3712056dbf5d6298fcf79d9eb7107ca57).  Looking through them, the recent popup link alignment changes from bug 1706534 appear to be the likely trigger; perhaps the hbox/vbox/flex changes in particular.

Steps to reproduce:
* use `about:config` to enable `browser.newtabpage.activity-stream.asrouter.devtoolsEnabled`
* in a new tab, click the wrench icon below the gear icon in the upper right
* search the page content for the word "PERSONAL"
* click the "Show" button to the right of that word
* Once the "Personalized CFR Recommendation" button appears in the URL bar, click it
